animeDescription: Every month, one random girl becomes a comfort station as students and staff from around the school use the comfort station for pleasure.
animeStaff: [['Hayakawa Naomi', ['Director', 'Storyboard', 'Character Design']], ['Hakaba', ['Original Creator']], ['Sawayama Shinichiro', ['Screenplay']], ['Akatsuki Shion', ['Animation Director', 'Character Design']]]
